articles.description: The New England Patriots steamrolled the Jacksonville Jaguars 50-10 on Sunday. Here are six things we learned in that Week 17 matchup.

articles.content:
Only the bold and the brave win football games in January. On an epic Sunday in the NFL, the Cardinals answered the call.
